website_summaries.verdict: An inexpensive and stable option that comes with a host of features and accessories.
pros: Comes with shelves, hooks for grilling utensils, a built-in bottle opener, and LED lights
A good look at an affordable price
Constructed of a powder-coated steel frame with a vented canopy
cons: Some reports of the canopy arriving with minor damage to the frame, or with parts missing

customer_reviews.title: So nice to have shade and a nice place to sit ...
customer_reviews.text: What an extraordinary structure for a extraordinary price!! Took two of us two hours to put together and it looks fabulous. So nice to have shade and a nice place to sit and eat. Its on our patio so I put sand bags on its legs to ensure its held down. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Always on Top

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my fiancé who loves to grill. Only issue was the lights that came with it fall off easily and we've had some nasty winds lately near us, so they blew right off and broke.
customer_reviews.author: iriskj583

customer_reviews.title: Good value, fairly sturdy once assembled.
customer_reviews.text: Box arrived in good shape. However several pieces had minor bends/damage. I was still able to get all pieces together and must admit I do like it overall. Provides shade at high noon. Purchased additional shade covers to block the sun at the sides and front/back. Fairly easy to put together by myself. Sturdy once the side glass counters put into place. Cheaper than local retail stores.
customer_reviews.author: D.Wo

customer_reviews.title: Packaging was great so I'll contribute that to quality control of the ...
customer_reviews.text: The nuts & bolts where packed in a plastic form and labeled as where the parts. This made assembly easier. The directions could be refined but where adequate. There where a few minor dings and scratches. Packaging was great so I'll contribute that to quality control of the manufacturer. The lights& bottle opener where missing but where credited and ordered This would have been a five star if not for the issues. The unit appears very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Eddy

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: Its simply a great buy. Best buck I spent. It was fairly easy to build. The instructions might look confusing but don't look to much into its easy. You need 2 people to build it. The tool isnt as helpful, I used a rachet just becareful with the torque, i would finish the tighten with the tool supplied. The led lights i didn't care for. I have my own lights. It came well packaged. No dents no scratches.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy B

customer_reviews.title: Canopy cover did not last 1.25 seasons (9months).
customer_reviews.text: 4/20/2019 - Purchased this canopy August 2017. Made sure to remove the canvas and store inside for the winters. Well this is my second season putting the canvas on and the corner completely ripped where the frame holds it in place and the cover is useless. I could live with the fact that the chocolate brown cover is now desert tan due to extreme fading but now that doesn't matter. You would think that something designed to be used in the elements would be a little more resistant to them. Buyer beware cover did not last more than 1.25 summers (9 months). Why are these stress points not reinforced? Frame is sturdy and rust free as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: My family and I bought this as a birthday gift for my husband. It was easy to assemble and there weren't any dings or dents as mentioned by other reviewers. The lights installed easily and while they don't give off enough light to see really well if you're grilling at night, they still look great. I also purchased weight bags for the legs to keep this from moving around during high winds and so far it's stayed put. We are planning to remove the fabric from the top for the winter months though.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Came broken
customer_reviews.text: There is a hook that goes in the center of the top and the bracket for that was broken off, so no hook for us. The rest went together fairly easily. One person can put it together, 2 just makes it easier and a bit faster. Light weight metal, so it won't last any wind at all. But makes for shade and a bit of a weather cover in rain. Shelves are glass and there are four light for the upper corners of the top which push on and off. Easy to install and take off for battery replacement. Of course, batteries not included. OK for the price, but nothing to write home about.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon lover

customer_reviews.title: This is a really nice idea and implementation
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter who wanted to grill outside on patio. Turns out to be somewhat better that I expected. Really no complaints, She has been using it a while now and loves it. WARNING: the box is HEAVY - you won't be carrying it your self unless you are a weightlifter. But it needs to be, to stay put in wind, etc. A very good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: S. W. Conley

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I'm very impressed with the quality of this product. Took about an hour to assemble by myself. Screwed it into my deck and railing. I doubt that it will blow away except maybe in a hurricane, but if it did I'd buy another in a heartbeat. Very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Keith E. Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Great product & Great customer service!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! It is perfect and nice...Looks like we spent a lot for it. One of the shelves arrived damaged in the box. We put it all together took a pic. Sent to Sunjoy and they sent the part immediately without having to jump thru hoops. Great customer service. Would definitely purchase another Sunjoy product. Very happy and satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sharlie

customer_reviews.title: I love this. Looks great
customer_reviews.text: I love this. Looks great. I put it together myself in a little over an hour. $50 cheaper than at Lowes.
customer_reviews.author: Russell

customer_reviews.title: Great BBQ Gazebo
customer_reviews.text: We previously had a BBQ Gazebo. Being in Florida, the canopy got sun rot and had to be replaced. We could not find a replacement anywhere. This new gazebo is from a company that has been around and supplies replacement canopies. I like the size of this (generous area for the grill and protection from the elements). The two glass shelves are a big help when grilling out. I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Bicky Boops

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic gazebo for grill
customer_reviews.text: LOVED this item. Each to assemble, even did it by myself (and yes I am a woman). However, I only enjoyed it 3 days sadly. I just moved to Ohio from CA and high winds pulled it up (even with spikes in ground) and blew it across the street into my neighbors driveway into a crumpled mess. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Caligirl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for the price
customer_reviews.text: I was actually surprised at how well this went together and how nice the finished product looks. Easy assembly in about 30 minutes, solo. There were a coup,e parts where it would have been nice to have a helper, but weren't terribly difficult for me as I have relatively long arms and could support one side while screwing in the other. I'm really happy with this so far.
customer_reviews.author: J. Truett

customer_reviews.title: I would buy this canopy again. We love it.
customer_reviews.text: The price was right. It was not too difficult to assemble-i did it mostly by myself. The canvas covers were a bit tight-hard to get that last corner secured-but that’s a good thing. The winds have been calm since we assembled our canopy, but they can get really strong here so the true test is yet to come. It looks fabulous. UPDATE: One year later, we moved and lost an important part. I tried to order a replacement part. CUSTOMER SERVICE IS HORRENDOUS. At this point I’m not certain I would order from SunJoy ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Product came damaged with dented frame parts and broken lights
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is great but I wish quality control was better because this is a nice canopy for the money. Although the shipping box came undamaged, on the inside the product had several metal pieces that came with dings and dents and one of the LED lights came broken. Unacceptable quality control. Buyer be aware. Will update with pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Luiza

customer_reviews.title: Sunjoy Grill Shade - No Excuse Not To Grill Even When The Sun Is Blazin
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband as he was complaining how it was too hot outside to use the BBQ grill. It took about 2 hours for him and one other to put together. The canopy top was the most difficult part as it had to be stretched into place just right. He used the holes already made in the legs to screw it into the deck for added security. It functions well, keeping him in the shade while grilling and it looks so Good! The added side shelves are good for holding condiments etc and could serve as a bar by adding stools.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Castellucci

customer_reviews.title: Love it.  Great canaopy for my grill.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I painted it with Rusteum first so it will last for years and then mounted it to two pressure treated 2x4’s. Then I mounted it to my concrete patio with masonary screws. Now I know it won’t go anywhere. Love this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: HistoryOfTheYankeesDOTcom

customer_reviews.title: Easy Assembly BUT one part was BROKEN and will need weld repair.
customer_reviews.text: Steel lip/insert on one of glass side trays was broken completely off; these side trays stabilize the entire gazebo. Will now need to find a "weld repair" glue to repair the damage. Several of the legs were slightly bent, dented or scratched. These were not shipping problems as the box and packing was all in very good condition. Easy assembly and all parts were in the packaging. Assembled by myself in less than an hour. There is no way to assemble incorrectly.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Solid and stable.
customer_reviews.text: While my larger canopy blew during a windy day, this product did not move at all. I did install sandbags to secure it, but that was for my further peace of mind. Love the shelves and my grill fits nicely. We cook all year long even in winter, and if the canopy is replaceable it will be the perfect purchase for us.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very nice gazebo
customer_reviews.text: This 8 x 5 ft grill gazebo is very nice, keeps our grilling area dry and protects us from the sun. The only reason I rated down to 4 stars is that a couple of the support beams were bent upon arrival and we had to work on them to get the thing put together. Other than that, it is very sturdy and we are pleased
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I saw this in a local home improvement store and decided to compare the price on Amazon. Funny that it was a flash sale on Amazon and I got it for $50 less than at the store. So I just put it up and it was super easy. It came with all the tools needed. Just need to buy batteries for the lights. Less than an hour it was up and ready to use. I want to buy another one because this thing is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: DOES the job. Minor issue.
customer_reviews.text: Item is a good buy for the price. (Aluminum framework) Light weight. Does the job. Con: Corner brackets are NOT straight - they are slightly bent. We had to drill a hole and utilze a 2" lag bolt because of the frame NOT being straight it pulled the original bolt lock out. Took us 5 mins to do. Only because we had tools. Am going to buy aother one for my lakehouse. Will do the job nicely. JUST be prepared. (See my pics.)
customer_reviews.author: Deb Carlin is THE BOOK DORK

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to put together. Even without reading the instructions. Seems to be good quality as well. The side racks give you more than enough space as well. The only complaint I could even think of is the bottle opener that it attached to one of the legs was placed so low. It would only work for Tyrion lannister. Other than that. I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Rosen

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as Expected
customer_reviews.text: The directions could use some work, so we used the pictures to get the idea. One of the poles arrived with a slight dent, but based off other reviews I expected it. Pretty sturdy once you put the glass shelving on. All the parts were there and no problems screwing in any of the poles, we did lay the gazebo down on the side to screw in the long poles, which made it so much easier. Have not installed the lights to the poles yet. The height and width is great. Overall, I am completely happy with the purchase. I took off a star for the dented pole.
customer_reviews.author: D. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Works well and good customer service
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Had for 3 months no in New Orleans Louisiana which has tons of rain. Paint holding up well along with tarp cover. When it arrived it was missing several pieces (the legs) and lights were broken. Customer service was fairly quick to get the correct parts out to me. Important to know: there is a VERY specific way the arms got the canopy top go together and into the legs. The instructions are worse than IKEA laying that out. So take your time and really look at it to save yourself some grief. All in all happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: robert goode

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the money
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and attractive. Delivered with some minor damage but not worth the hassle to report. Over all a good product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Great to Sit Under on our Deck!!
customer_reviews.text: We have a small deck where the sun beats down. We set this up and attached it to the railings. Then we bought a roll-up screen for the back side. It is perfect for hubby and I to sit on the deck and have our coffee in the morning! We love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Martha A. Piro

customer_reviews.title: Very functional
customer_reviews.text: Canopy works great over our outdoor kitchen. The only problem is the lights. They are LED, battery powered, with no shut off switch. So, the 3 batteries each light (x 4) lasted 3 days because you cannot turn them off (and they don't go off during the day.) We will not use them and will look for another set of lights that either turn off or are solar powered. What a waste of batteries.
customer_reviews.author: abb

customer_reviews.title: Poor customer service if you have a problem
customer_reviews.text: The gazebo is wonderful but Sunjoy customer service stinks. One of the LED lights did not work so we called customer service, stated they would send one out. This was Mother’s Day weekend. When we didn’t receive the light we called back two weeks ago. Rep told us to give him 24 hours and he would be calling us back. Still waiting to hear from him
customer_reviews.author: Linda L

customer_reviews.title: Damaged goods.
customer_reviews.text: I'll make this simple... We found deep dings on almost all the parts and the canvas has small thin threaded areas which can not be seen unless light is shinning through and also two parts that hold up the thing had to be hammered into place in order to get the nuts and bolts in to tighten. We got together and it seems to work fine but the point is... if you are buying something NEW...it needs to be right. I won't be buying anything else from this company at all. Perhaps others may have a better experience than myself.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Cash

customer_reviews.title: Works and looks great
customer_reviews.text: Love this gazebo! I like to grill year around and this will make it easier to do regardless of the weather. The lights are great when cooking after dark. Easy to assemble, but instructions could be improved.
customer_reviews.author: Robert P. Hirsch

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. It arrived a couple days later than the estimated time but it was in perfect condition. I gave 4 stars because the instructions could have been better. Also placing the canopy was extremely diffixult and took some outaide the boxing thinking. It was a really tight fit. It looks amazing once we got it up. Definitely a two person job.
customer_reviews.author: Jose D. Freire

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together with two people.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this! Good thing I didn't waste the $475 Amazon wanted to have a professional put it together though. The product shows an install time of approximately 10 hours...what? My 15 year old son and I put it together in less than an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Christine D

customer_reviews.title: POOR CHOICE
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this grill canopy for my husband it took weeks, then amazon canceled and reordered the canopy taking even another week. Once assembled the front left corner fabric ripped and now water accumulates in the middle on the left side. It's a horrible investment and I am not happy at all with this model. Brand new with a torn canopy.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Giles

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Easy enough to put together. Comes damaged in shipping as usual, but I guess that can't be helped with the way UPS handles packages. Looks great. Will update as to longevity if I remember to.
customer_reviews.author: J.E.

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and the shelves and hooks are very usefull
customer_reviews.text: I used this gazebo to house our new grill. It is pretty and works well. The only thing I don’t like very much is that the smoke goes up into the center opening and gets redirected downwards by the upper section of the canopy.
customer_reviews.author: Ma Lourdes Alba

customer_reviews.title: Ok but came with dents
customer_reviews.text: Instructions are pretty lame. I figured it out only because I put things together a lot. It has a couple dents in the metal parts but other than that it is ok. I will be requesting the dented parts be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Watch Enthusiast

customer_reviews.title: Rust and canopy tears
customer_reviews.text: For the money its okay. It did not last a year. 6 months after purchase the top pieces began to rust. A strong wind broke off the top due to extensive rusting. The canopy also began to tear through on the corners.
customer_reviews.author: Tess Tourelle

customer_reviews.title: No regrets , looks great, easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: like I said, no regrets, easy to install. looks great above my grill. I was tired of adding and removing the grill cover and forgetting half the time to put it back on and it would get covered in rain usually....plus the grill cover made my patio look like were in winter mode the entire year. I love this canopy. it matches my grill. it doesn't take up as much space as I thought it would.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy4two

customer_reviews.title: Enjoying our Sunjoy!
customer_reviews.text: Really like this canopy. It was easy to put together. Was able to take BBQ off the covered patio and give it it's own space. Would have given more stars, but there were several dents in the frame. Too much trouble to send back, so will live with it.
customer_reviews.author: DJR

customer_reviews.title: Great product.  Lousy support
customer_reviews.text: We love the canopy. However, there was a broken weld on the small beam. Even though this is supposed to be under warranty they wanted to charge use $1.50 for the replacement and $18 to ship. Needless to say we did not get the part.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Swift

customer_reviews.title: Rusted parts, lights dont work
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking product, but metal pieces came bent which made it difficult to properly put together. I was able to make that work but after putting together, I realized there's some pieces that are rusted already. The rust wasn't noticed until pieces were turned a certain way more than 90% put together. Mind you, i just received the item the day of this review so it was sent to me like this. Also, 3 out of 4 lights do not work. It's put together at this point, but I will be contacting seller for these issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Surprising durable in high winds
customer_reviews.text: This product is great and even survived a hurricane. Have had it up multiple times in 50+mph winds and it was fine. Just make sure to use the included stakes to bolt it into ground.
customer_reviews.author: sundancr123

customer_reviews.title: easy set-up, used a couple pavers to weigh down ...
customer_reviews.text: easy set-up, used a couple pavers to weigh down the posts (may want to move it). LED lights are a joke..unless you're 6'+ and like changing batteries
customer_reviews.author: Michael McCartney

customer_reviews.title: Is very pretty addition to the yard
customer_reviews.text: Pay attention when putting together. Is very pretty addition to the yard. Should last a long time. Very sturdy. Canvas top very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amy L. Sultzbaugh

customer_reviews.title: Good covering. Covering pit while grillin😎
customer_reviews.text: Yes! I've got the koolest grilling pit in town. It was hard to anchor tent to the ground with the supplied tent spikes due to the level of my yard. So I used sand filled anchor bags with tarp cam lines.
customer_reviews.author: KWB

customer_reviews.title: It’s great for smaller spaces. Not just for a grill.
customer_reviews.text: We are in the Southern CA sun next to a pool with smaller dimensions. This works so well for one piece of outdoor furniture to escape the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Sears

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, looks great on my patio and the grill fits nicely. It does not fully protect your grill, you still need to remember to cover your grill so it doesn't get wet during hard rainstorms.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Double

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband a month ago. It was delivered faster than expected, he easily put it together by himself. I feel like the lights are a little "cheap" feeling/looking, but, the rest of it is very nice. If you plan to put it on a deck or patio (any place except the grass) you will need to but screws/anchors for it.
customer_reviews.author: Katie P

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product/ Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived as scheduled, one of the led lights was broken, but contacted their customer service and they resolved the issue within a couple hours. Looks to be a really nice product, now if i can just find some sides for this for winter.
customer_reviews.author: Big John

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: This Grill Gazebo has weathered Snow and wind gusts up to 90 mph all winter without any visible damage or strain. Super impressed! Note: Anticipating high winds which we always receive preceding a winter storm, I drilled holes in to the pavers this gazebo sits on and anchored the unit down with long stakes.
customer_reviews.author: Willi Wurst

customer_reviews.title: It's exactly what we wanted and looks great.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure about the other comments regarding 'fit'; there's clearly only one way to put this on. It's exactly what we wanted and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: SMZ

customer_reviews.title: BBQ Gazebo
customer_reviews.text: Great price, easy to put together. Includes shelves, bottle opener and LED lights. Good quality, great item.
customer_reviews.author: John G

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed! Solid framing and fairly easy to put together!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and sturdy! Fits perfectly on my balcony. I gave it 4 stars because one of the attachable lights won't holdin the on position and the box was too large for me to carry. Wonderful purchase all around and I would recommend it to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Skye Jones

customer_reviews.title: The place to be
customer_reviews.text: Of all the patio furniture we bought this season- we sit here the most!! We got 4 barstools two each side and we love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Zannetti

customer_reviews.title: perfect for the BBQ grill!
customer_reviews.text: perfect for the BBQ grill! It was very easy to put together, took less than an hour!
customer_reviews.author: BPM

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the rain off while grilling
customer_reviews.text: Nice size, like the side glass rails to hold utensils while cooking, fits our large grill, has lights on the top to see in the dark too. You will need to secure it to the ground, could see it catching a strong wind during and blowing off the deck.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price it’s amazing. A couple little scratches and dings but we love it so much we are going to buy another
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Gleason

customer_reviews.title: But the directions are a little unclear but still easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: You will definitely want two people and a couple of hours to set this up. But the directions are a little unclear but still easy to put together. Looks great can’t wait to get use of it
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I went into a store and saw it but there was no way I could have transported it so I checked amazon and I was happy. Great product very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy.  Will probably buy two more.
customer_reviews.text: Protects from hot sun & Light rain. Installed an indoor/outdoor fan to keep air moving during hot evenings. Keeps griddle dry & clean
customer_reviews.author: Doabs1

customer_reviews.title: Good cover for outdoor grilling
customer_reviews.text: This is a two people job assembly; although there were some minor defects on parts we are enjoying the shaded area. It has held up well with a few high wind & rain storms in the area. Good product for the price
customer_reviews.author: Botuna

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what we needed.
customer_reviews.text: I get compliments on this thing all the time. Good quality. Good price. The lights come in handy when feeling at night. Just what we were looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain on a solid frame
customer_reviews.text: The instructions were perfect. Everything fits, the unit is really sturdy and heavyweight. I would suggest if you’re not 6’ tall, I’d assemble the roof separately and then put it on.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea  K Cleeton

customer_reviews.title: Love this grill cover!
customer_reviews.text: Love this cover I bought for our grill! Easy to assemble; I did it myself. Just needed help moving it into position.
customer_reviews.author: RMann

customer_reviews.title: Seems good
customer_reviews.text: Went together easy. I anchored it to the deck so seems Pretty sturdy. Time will tell. I wanted it so I could use my edd and traeger in the rain
customer_reviews.author: Markspm

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Great gazebo. Little difficult to put together, but worth it. It even has a bottle opener. It seems slightly smaller than 5x8 but it works for us
customer_reviews.author: miss_vic

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Covers my bbq area which helps with sun and rain
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Very nice easy to construct but two out of four lights ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice easy to construct but two out of four lights were broken, otherwise very nice unit for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Robert K.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this grill gazebo! Looks super nice on my deck too
customer_reviews.author: Kelly, TX

customer_reviews.title: FYI doesn’t not come with batteries but I love it
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!!! Came with one dent on the part where two pieces needed to connect but my husband just got a wrench and bent it back into place so the pieces could slide into each other
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra M

customer_reviews.title: The top can be removed in case of a stormy weather
customer_reviews.text: I installed it in less than a hour and a half bye myself very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: poppy

customer_reviews.title: product quality
customer_reviews.text: I the canopy cover should be somewhat heavier! It will not stand-up to wind gusts 20+ mph.
customer_reviews.author: Eric R. Braxton

customer_reviews.title: The first is three seasons old and is as good as new
customer_reviews.text: Have two of these now. The first is three seasons old and is as good as new. They're simple to assemble and easy to disassemble for storage.
customer_reviews.author: OpenRoad1

customer_reviews.title: Rust and fell apart
customer_reviews.text: I have had this gazebo for 2 years and after the first year it started to rust and this year it completely rusted and fell completely apart. I am totally disappointed. Is there anything that can be done? Or any compensation?
customer_reviews.author: Nadidi

customer_reviews.title: Looks great! Wish it would stand up though.
customer_reviews.text: Product seems to be good quality and looks really good. Only problem is that I cant get it to stand up without the hardware (still waiting over a month for missing parts to be delivered. Guess we'll just enjoy it like this for now.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Ross

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this little canopy. Fits nicely on our small deck...
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t  recommend
customer_reviews.text: Product should be nice but just like others mine showed up and 4 of the pieces were damaged large dents in the poles. I called customer service and those parts are on backorder.
customer_reviews.author: David Vallie

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Came with one broken weld which lucky I have a welding rig and was able to fix because the return policy makes it difficult to return due to its size. Most of the other welds didn't look strong as well. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: travis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great my second one, lasts years even in horrid weather!
customer_reviews.author: Lali

customer_reviews.title: The gazebo looks great once put together and is good quality for only ...
customer_reviews.text: The gazebo looks great once put together and is good quality for only $100. I have to deduct one star as some of the pieces on the gazebo I received did not fit together as easily as shown in the instructions and took a lot of manipulating.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: My husband LOVES this over his grill! Very sturdy, easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: meerkat

customer_reviews.title: Love this canopy
customer_reviews.text: Love this canopy, the only problem some of the parts were bent, call the 800 number, spoke to a live person, had all my information, they mailed me another part. love it!
customer_reviews.author: Cole

customer_reviews.title: Not worth your time.
customer_reviews.text: Piece of crap and did not survive any kind of wind. Was weighted down and still got blow away and torn to pieces. Don’t buy this unless you want to buy a new one in 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Cpatten

customer_reviews.title: Several of the poles were dented when it arrived and ...
customer_reviews.text: Several of the poles were dented when it arrived and now the base is starting to rust. We have only had it for 3 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: this was as much as the replacement cover itself. Very easy to install, works perfectly, very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Linder

customer_reviews.title: Sunjoy
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for the price. Set up was easy. Works great keep sun rays away while cooking. I live in Florida so the sun is brutal. This should last 2 years or so.
customer_reviews.author: mikal ware

customer_reviews.title: Pay attention to the leg configuration
customer_reviews.text: Solid product easy to configure. Only downside was it didn’t specify which leg was the correct leg (they were labeled but two had the same letter). If I took a second look I might have caught it, just had to unscrew then rescrew the proper sides.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Romeo

customer_reviews.title: One of the supports bent and led light broken
customer_reviews.text: I used it for barbecuing to keep out if the sun
customer_reviews.author: marlene mc craw

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy
customer_reviews.text: Bent poles. Will put together as is because party on Sunday.. Very disappointed in Amazon on this..
customer_reviews.author: FRANK BASILE

customer_reviews.title: Very nice although I do recommend purchasing weights for it
customer_reviews.text: Very nice although I do recommend purchasing weights for it. Research them though, because the ones that were recommended did not fit the "feet"; we actually fit them at the top of the poles, just under the canopy.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Larson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, looks like it should be much more expensive than it is. Has stood up to several thunderstorms without issue. We use it to create a little sitting area on our small deck. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves it and it gives us so much room on the deck!
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son-in-law like ours so I bought him one and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Al Radicioni

customer_reviews.title: Sunjoy grilling gazebo
customer_reviews.text: It took a little while to put together, but all the pieces were there and fit together good. Very sturdy when screwed to the deck. Like the shelves and tool hooks.
customer_reviews.author: ben

customer_reviews.title: CUSTOMER SERVICE SUCKS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: NEVER BUY FROM SUNJOY AGAIN, THEIR CUSTOMER SERVICE SUCKS!!! MONTHS AND MONTHS AND I STILL CANNOT GET THE BRAND NEW LIGHT THAT CAME WITH IT THAT ARE BROKEN REPLACED!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Great cover for a pit
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to put over our new pit. Looks great and the quality is good too!
customer_reviews.author: Lanice M Sales

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Arrived a bit damaged but easy to assemble and so far so problems.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

product_meta.title: Sunjoy L-GG001PST-F 8' X 5' Soft Top Brown Double Tiered Canopy Grill Gazebo With 4Pcs Led Gazebo Grill,
product_meta.description: Protect yourself against the heat of the sun while doing your outdoor grilling with the Sun joy 8' x 5 Soft top Grill Gazebo with 4pcs LED. An innovative and sophisticated design, the gazebo features a durable, soft-top two-tiered vented canopy made of polyester to add ventilation against smoke while creating a sturdy shade and protection against sun and wind. The steel frames of the grill gazebo provides a stable support for the whole structure, and has a powder-coated finish that is durable and rust-resistant. With a footprint spanning 8' x 5' feet, there's plenty of room to do your grilling. Plus, the stylish LED lights installed on the four posts of the canopy enables you to do your grilling even during the crack of night.
feature_bullets: Perfect for adding shade and protection during grilling or outdoor cooking
Vented, double-tiered canopy offers smoke ventilation and stability against windy conditions
Durable steel frame with powder-coated finish is rust-resistant
Shelves on both sides provide space for placing cutleries or grilling accessories
8' x 5' footprint gives enough room to accommodate most grills. Item Dimensions- 96.1 x 59.8 x 98.4 inches

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars357 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
